amendment.description: Amendment reduces and then increases funding for the United States Immigration and Customs Enforcement Salaries and Expenses account by $5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 105 printed in the Congressional Record to increase and decrease the United States Immigration and Customs Enforcement salaries and expenses account by $5,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A029) Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 195 (Roll no. 478).
